hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: I’m a Full Stack Developer specializing in crafting intuitive React frontends and robust Node.js backend systems. I excel in designing REST APIs with Express.js, managing databases using Prisma and PostgreSQL, and enhancing application reliability through TypeScript. Passionate about clean code and efficient problem-solving, I strive to build scalable and maintainable solutions. Feel free to explore my projects below or get in touch to discuss how I can help your next project succeed.

project_list.title: PawMap
project_list.description: PawMap is a comprehensive Full Stack web application that leverages modern technologies like React and Node.js to create an interactive, map-based interface. The project's goal is to provide a central platform for pet owners to discover and share pet-friendly locations.

project_list.title: Silver Arrow Car
project_list.description: For Silver Arrow Car Ltd., I created a dynamic digital showroom that transforms car buying into an experience. On the platform, prospective buyers can not only view and filter cars but also create a 'virtual garage.' The project is a Full Stack solution, complemented by an administrative system with full CRUD operations, giving operators complete control.

experience.title: Professional Experience
description: As a member of a 3-person agile team, we developed a full-fledged web application from planning to deployment.
I was independently responsible for designing and implementing the entire backend for the Event and Comment modules using Node.js and Express.js.
I developed the REST API endpoints and implemented a robust search and filtering functionality to ensure efficient data retrieval.
On the frontend, I developed the user-specific 'My Locations' and 'My Events' pages, ensuring that each user could only modify and delete their own data (CRUD).
I was responsible for key UI components of the project, including the fully responsive Header and the Event Creation page.
I actively participated in code review processes, and we used Git and JIRA for teamwork.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a project in mind, want to discuss potential roles, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. You can contact me via email or find me on various social media platforms.
